QuestData.Title: Sustain, In Vain
QuestData.Description:
These turncoats have kept busy. They've opened more portals around the area, allowing themselves to replenish their numbers with little trouble.
Even with her might, the Paragon cannot eliminate an endless army. Let us destroy these portals. Without reinforcements to sustain this contingent, it will surely fall.
QuestData.RewardText: No longer can they sustain themselves. Good work.
